page.title: 05A day of an Ythanwells boy.
page.content: I get up at 8 o'clock, get dressed and get my breakfast of cornflakes, milk and toast.Then I go to school in the school car.There we do English and maths until we have a break at 10.45am when we eat a packet of crisps.Before lunch we have either music, drama,art, phys.education,religious education or swimming.Then we have school lunch. Then we do environmental studies, art and craft and practice our musical instruments.I play the melodica. At 15.30 the school car takes me home.I get a drink of orange and change into my playing clothes.I do my homework, go outside to help my father feed the cattle and muck the byre and put straw for bedding in the cattle court.Other cattle get barley and hay.When Dad is working in the field and my brother helps me, we feed all the cattle ourselves.
